title: Koiseyo Kimono Otome
alternative_title: 恋せよキモノ乙女 ; Koi Seyo Kimono Otome ; Fall in Love with a Girl in a Kimono ; 戀愛吧和服少女 ; Полюби девушку в кимоно
status: 恋せよキモノ乙女 ; Koi Seyo Kimono Otome ; Fall in Love with a Girl in a Kimono ; 戀愛吧和服少女 ; Полюби девушку в кимоно
description:
Description :
        Momo Nonomura lives with her family in Osaka. Enjoying a day off from work is going out with a kimono inherited from the grandmother who passed away. On a holiday in in March, I fell in love with a man at a long-established coffee shop in Kyoto who was sitting alone.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: Rokuyosha Coffee Shop, Kyoto
